sources.title: Sweden's Underworld of Drugs | Blonde in Bondage (1957) Crime, Drama | Colorized Full Movie
sources.description:
Her body screamed for the thing she hated!  American reporter doing a story on Swedish nightlife gets involved with a drug-addicted nightclub singer.

Original title: Blondin i fara (1957) AKA: Narkotika

Black & White version: https://youtu.be/_vdQmvzdWHU

Director: Robert Brandt
Writers: Peter Bourne, BÃ¶rje Nyberg
Stars: Mark Miller, Lars Ekborg, Anita Thallaug
Genres: Colorized classics, Crime, Drama

00:00 A man named Larry travels to Sweden for a secret assignment and meets a woman named Ingrid.
11:10  Max and his partner Mona are traveling to Stockholm for a show, but their car gets stuck in a ditch. Max meets a woman named Lola and they bond over their shared connection to Max. They both express concern for Mona, who seems unhappy. Lola suggests they try to help her.
27:30 Max is selling drugs and Mona is addicted, but an American newspaper man is trying to help her.
47:09 Mr. Brown confronts Max about the whereabouts of Mona and threatens him, leading to a physical altercation and Max being knocked out.
53:17 Larry is searching for something and encounters various obstacles.
1:08:24  Brian approaches Inspector Ben with information about a narcotics gang operating in Stockholm and offers to help catch them by setting up a meeting with one of their victims.
